testcase.name: CLP works for files with >5 lines
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: CLP works for files with >5 lines Given a set of specific large files ... passed in 0.000s | fin | fout | expected | | test1.txt | test11.txt | test111.txt | | test2.txt | test22.txt | test222.txt | When we run our CLP2 ... passed in 0.070s Then we will find fout matches expected ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: CLP works for files with 1-5 lines
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: CLP works for files with 1-5 lines Given a set of specific small files ... passed in 0.000s | fin | fout | | test3.txt | test33.txt | | test4.txt | test44.txt | When we run our CLP2 ... passed in 0.065s Then we will find fin matches fout ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: CLP works for empty files
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: CLP works for empty files Given a set of specific empty files ... passed in 0.000s | fin | | test5.txt | | test6.txt | When we try to run our CLP2 ... passed in 0.068s Then we will find CLP returns correct error ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
